data.name: Deadpool
data.description: A magical unicorn who specializes in stab-shooting vulnerable targets.

starItems.name: Deadpool
starItems.description: A magical unicorn who specializes in stab-shooting vulnerable targets.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Attack always Crits if the target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color> or has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on Bonus attack

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Attack always Crits if the target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color> or has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Bonus attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>80%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Attack always Crits if the target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color> or has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on Bonus attack

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>80%</color> chance to Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
Attack always Crits if the target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color> or has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Always Bonus attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
Attack always Crits if the target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color> or has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on Bonus attack

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.
Attack always Crits if the target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color> or has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on Bonus attack

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
Attack always Crits if the target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color> or has <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.

1.description:
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing.
If X-23 or Old Man Logan is an ally, instead, clear all Barrier on the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, then attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing.

On Kill, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

2.description:
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.
If X-23 or Old Man Logan is an ally, instead, clear all Barrier on the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, then attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

On Kill, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

3.description:
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>310%</color> Piercing.
If X-23 or Old Man Logan is an ally, instead, clear all Barrier on the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, then attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>310%</color> Piercing.

On Kill, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

On Kill, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

5.description:

6.description:
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>490%</color> Piercing.
If X-23 or Old Man Logan is an ally, instead, clear all Barrier on the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, then attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>490%</color> Piercing.

On Kill, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

7.description:
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>550%</color> Piercing.
If X-23 or Old Man Logan is an ally, instead, clear all Barrier on the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, then attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>550%</color> Piercing.

On Kill, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If Domino or Pandapool is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> additional targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If Domino or Pandapool is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to additional targets

3.description:

If Domino or Pandapool is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color>-<color=#86e619>7</color> additional targets

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If Domino or Pandapool is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>6</color>-<color=#86e619>7</color> additional targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>6</color>-<color=#86e619>7</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

6.nextUpgrade:

+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to additional targets

7.description:

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>6</color>-<color=#86e619>7</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If Domino or Pandapool is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

1.description:
On Kill, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to generate Ability Energy for a random Cable or Old Man Logan ally.

On any ally Deathpool's turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when a Deathpool ally uses their Ultimate Ability, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>30%</color> of Max Health. If Domino, Deathpool, or Old Man Logan is an ally, <color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>100%</color> of Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from Self
If negative effect removed, Heal <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed

2.description:
On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from Self. If negative effect removed, Heal <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
On Kill, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to generate Ability Energy for a random Cable or Old Man Logan ally.

On any ally Deathpool's turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when a Deathpool ally uses their Ultimate Ability, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>30%</color> of Max Health. If Domino, Deathpool, or Old Man Logan is an ally, <color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>100%</color> of Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, clear all negative effects from Self
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to generate Ability Energy

3.description:
On Turn, clear all negative effects from Self. If negative effects removed, Heal <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
On Kill, <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to generate Ability Energy for a random Cable or Old Man Logan ally.

On any ally Deathpool's turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when a Deathpool ally uses their Ultimate Ability, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>30%</color> of Max Health. If Domino, Deathpool, or Old Man Logan is an ally, <color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>100%</color> of Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
Heal for +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing per negative effect removed

4.description:
On Turn, clear all negative effects from Self. If negative effects removed, Heal <color=#86e619>15%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per negative effect removed.
On Kill, <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to generate Ability Energy for a random Cable or Old Man Logan ally.

On any ally Deathpool's turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when a Deathpool ally uses their Ultimate Ability, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>30%</color> of Max Health. If Domino, Deathpool, or Old Man Logan is an ally, <color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>100%</color> of Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
Heal for +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing per negative effect removed
Always generate Ability Energy

5.description:
On Turn, clear all negative effects from Self. If negative effects removed, Heal <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> per negative effect removed.
On Kill, generate Ability Energy for a random Cable or Old Man Logan ally.

On any ally Deathpool's turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when a Deathpool ally uses their Ultimate Ability, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.

<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>30%</color> of Max Health. If Domino, Deathpool, or Old Man Logan is an ally, <color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Revive at <color=#86e619>100%</color> of Max Health.
